all-classes.description: Documentation for classes includes syntax, usage information, and code samples for methods, properties, and event handlers and listeners for those APIs that belong to a specific class in ActionScript. The classes are listed alphabetically. If you are not sure to which class a certain method or property belongs, you can look it up in the Index.

deprecated.shortDescription: A list of deprecated items and suggested alternatives when available.

package.name: com.soma.core
package.shortDescription: Contains the Soma class (entry point of the framework)
package.longDescription: Contains the Soma class (entry point of the framework)

package.name: com.soma.core.controller
package.shortDescription: Contains classes related to commands and events.
package.longDescription: Contains classes related to commands and events.

package.name: com.soma.core.di
package.shortDescription: Contains classes related to dependency injection.
package.longDescription: Contains classes related to dependency injection.

package.name: com.soma.core.interfaces
package.shortDescription: Contains the interfaces used in the framework.
package.longDescription: Contains the interfaces used in the framework.

package.name: com.soma.core.mediator
package.shortDescription: Contains the mediators manager and a Mediator abstract class.
package.longDescription: Contains the mediators manager and a Mediator abstract class.

package.name: com.soma.core.model
package.shortDescription: Contains the models manager and a Model abstract class.
package.longDescription: Contains the models manager and a Model abstract class.

package.name: com.soma.core.wire
package.shortDescription: Contains the wires manager and a Wire abstract class.
package.longDescription: Contains the wires manager and a Wire abstract class.
